record.value: This field defines the function name.
\w+^^Name may contain only Latin letters, digits, and underscores
This field is used to set a human-readable function description.
This field is used to define the function input format.
This field is used to define the function output format.
This field is used to specify the detailed function description.
This field defines the current function group. It can be NULL if the function does not belong to any group.
This field defines the permission level in the model context (or the context the relative model is attached to, or the instantable model's instance context) required to execute the function.
This field defines the function implementation type.
This field is available if the Type field is set to Java Code. The Java class source code implements the function body, i.e. does the job that the function is supposed to do.
This field is available if the Type field is set to Expression. The expression will be evaluated during the function execution.
This field is available if the Type field is set to Query. The query will be evaluated during the function execution.
Defines whether multiple calls of this function can work concurrently.
